title: Geek Bar Pulse 15000 Puffs 5pk
description: Introducing the Geek Bar Pulse 15000 Disposable, a game-changer in the vaping world. This innovative device is designed for those who demand the best in both performance and style. With the world's first full-screen display, you can easily monitor your power and liquid levels, ensuring you're always in control.  The Geek Bar Pulse offers two distinct modes to suit your vaping preferences. Regular mode boasts an impressive 15,000 puffs, perfect for long-term use. For those moments when you crave intense flavor and dense clouds, switch to Pulse mode and enjoy 7,500 puffs powered by a robust 20W output. The dual mesh coil ensures consistent flavor and vapor production, making every puff a satisfying experience.  The 16ml e-liquid capacity combined with a 5% nicotine strength delivers a smooth and potent hit each time. The bite-friendly mouthpiece adds comfort to your vaping sessions, making the Geek Bar Pulse not just a device, but a companion for your vaping journey. Experience the pinnacle of disposable vapes with the Geek Bar Pulse 15000. Detailed Features:  Number of Puffs: In regular mode, enjoy up to 15,000 puffs. Pulse mode offers 7,500 puffs with enhanced flavor and vapor. E-liquid Capacity: The device holds 16ml of e-liquid, ensuring long-lasting use without frequent refills. Nicotine Strength: Contains 5% nicotine, providing a strong and satisfying nicotine hit. Battery Capacity: Powered by a 20W output, ensuring consistent performance throughout its lifespan. Innovative Display: Features the world's first full-screen display, allowing easy monitoring of power and liquid levels. Dual Mesh Coil: Provides consistent and rich flavors, enhancing your vaping experience. Bite-friendly Mouthpiece: Designed for comfort, allowing you to enjoy your vape sessions without discomfort.
